text: Terrible experience trying to work with ShaftTech. Attempted to purchase a bearing, and they offered to deliver on Monday, between 10 and 5. I received a call on Tuesday at around 4, saying that the bearing would be delivered on Wednesday. I provided a phone number and specified that it could be used to contact me through text. On Friday, while in class, I received no less than 13 calls about the delivery of my bearing, none of which I was able to pick up. It is now Saturday, the bearing has not been delivered, and the only number that called me that picked up when I called back was the delivery man, who said that the office was going to "contact me", but that the office was closed until February 11 (today is February 2, I placed my order for the bearing on January 24). I need the bearing by Monday, and since this very disappointing company is unable to provide even the most basic of services, the whole project grinds to a stop.

Brought a broken ball screw to the ShaftTech team on a friday, they managed to come up with a solution and fabricate a replacement lead screw on Saturday. Managed to stick to the project schedule thanks to their efforts. Deeply appreciate their help, definitely will come back again.
- Daryl Koh @ ArchiBiz C Engineering Pte Ltd
Very fast & good service. Look for Grace, she will made things happen!
Ordered bearings yesterday and received it this morning. Great service and fast delivery!
Thanks for attending to my urgent request on a saturday afternoon. Really appreciate it!
